name: dateAdd
description: Adds units of time to a date.

params.name: datepart
params.description:
`yyyy` - Year
`q` - Quarter
`m` - Month
`y` - Day of year
`d` - Day
`w` - Week day
`ww` - Week
`h` - Hour
`n` - Minute
`s` - Second
`l` - Millisecond

params.name: number
params.description:
The number of datepart units to add to the provided date.
 Negative integers move the date into the past, positive into the future.

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available in CF11+.

lucee.notes: Member function is available in Lucee4.5+

examples.title: Add Weeks to a Date
examples.description: Here we're adding 8 weeks to the date August 3rd, 2014.
